**2023-04-12 / @adonovan, @andybons, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **all: add opt-in transparent telemetry to Go toolchain** [#58894](https://go.dev/issue/58894)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **embed: openFile should implement ReaderAt** [#57803](https://go.dev/issue/57803)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add func (\*TCPConn) MultipathTCP() (bool, error)** [#59166](https://go.dev/issue/59166)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: a general approach to type inference** [#58650](https://go.dev/issue/58650)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/crypto/x509roots: new module** [#57792](https://go.dev/issue/57792)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
